title: Mind Body and Soul Healing Center Celebrates 10th Anniversary with Ribbon Cutting
author: Greg Hambrick
description: Also hosting open house during downtown Leesburg's First Friday celebration.
cleaned_text: Body and Soul Healing Center Celebrates 10th Anniversary with Ribbon Cutting Also hosting open house during downtown Leesburg's First Friday celebration. Release, Town of Leesburg: Mind Body and Soul Healing Center will celebrate the business' 10th anniversary with a special ribbon cutting ceremony, officiated by Mayor Kristen Umstattd, at 6:30pm on Friday, April 4, 2014. Mind Body and Soul Healing Center is located at 101A South King Street in downtown Leesburg. In addition to the ribbon cutting ceremony, Mind Body and Soul will host an open house as part of downtown Leesburg's monthly First Friday celebration of the arts. "We will be offering free chair massages and drawings for free services throughout the evening," said owner Jennifer Merritts. "In addition, we will have live music and refreshments. We encourage everyone to come check out our center and see how good it feels to be here." Merritts opened Mind Body and Soul in April 2004 as a one-woman massage therapy business. She has grown Mind Body and Soul into a full service healing center with seven therapists offering massage therapy, Reiki, Chakra balancing, guided mediation, IET energy healing, nutritional guidance, essential oil therapy, private yoga classes and much more.
